    • Uses of TunableEngine in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

      Classes in net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine that implement TunableEngine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Detroid
      A UCI compatible, tunable chess engine that utilizes magic bit boards and most search heuristics and supports Polyglot opening books.
